title: 현재와 미래 계획 대화
description: 현재 진행 중인 일과 미래 계획에 대한 대화를 듣고 이해합니다.

audio.text:
Hi Sarah! What are you doing right now?

Oh, hi Mike! I'm working on my presentation for tomorrow's meeting. It's taking longer than I expected.

That sounds stressful. Are you going to finish it today?

I hope so. I'm planning to work on it for another two hours. What about you? What are you up to?

I'm just relaxing at home. But I'm going to the gym later. I'm trying to exercise more regularly these days.

That's great! I should do that too. So, what are you doing this weekend?

Well, I'm meeting some friends on Saturday. We're going to watch a movie and have dinner together. It'll be fun!

Nice! I'm visiting my parents this weekend. I haven't seen them for a month.

Oh, that will be lovely. Are you taking the train?

No, I'm driving. I'm leaving early Saturday morning. The traffic is usually lighter then.

Sounds like a good plan. By the way, did you hear about the company party next month?

Yes! I heard it's going to be at a fancy restaurant. I'm really looking forward to it.

Me too! I think it will be a great opportunity to relax and socialize with everyone.

Definitely! Well, I should get back to my presentation now.

Okay, good luck with that! I'll see you tomorrow at the office.
